CREATE TABLE application.task( id bigserial NOT NULL, task_id bigserial NOT NULL, summary character varying, -- описание estimate_pre numeric, -- предположительное время estimate_real numeric NULL, -- затраченное время assignee bigint NULL, -- кому поручена status_id bigint NOT NULL default 1,
user_id bigint, added timestamp NULL, modified timestamp NULL, del boolean default false, done boolean default false,
CONSTRAINT task_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT task_user_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES application.users (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT task_user_fk2 FOREIGN KEY (assignee) REFERENCES application.users (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT task_status_fk FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES application.status (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
